feed.title: EastEnd Meats & Sausage
feed.subtitle: EastEnd Meats & Sausage is a family owned and operated retail meat shop in Winnipeg, Manitoba. We're committed to serving quality meats products and service in the Transcona neighborhoods for years. Whether youâ€™re shopping for locally-sourced fresh meats, homestyle sausages, deli meats, beef jerky, or dog treats, you can always count on us for great quality and taste.
